name: Candy Surprise Eggs - Eat Yummy Candy
name_original: Candy Surprise Eggs - Eat Yummy Candy
description:
Bored of toys and want some candy treats instead? Candy Surprise Eggs has all kinds of yummy candy to collect and eat!

Candy Surprise Eggs is a free super fun candy collecting game where every day will feel like your birthday as you get as much chocolate and sweets as you can eat!

HOW TO PLAY

drop a coin into the all new candy egg surprise machine, Claw up your exciting new candy egg and rip off the foil and pop it open to reveal like by magic a brand new candy prize, Wow!

You also get your very own Candy collectors shop where you can show off all your cool new toys to your family and friends. Then treat them to lots of candy treats, can you collect them all?

There are 50 different Candy prizes to collect including: Chocolate bars, Gummy bears, jawbreakers, candy corns, lollipops, jello baby and much more!

If you love watching toy surprise egg opening videos online you will love this app!
become your very own Surprise Collector star.

Candy Surprise Eggs is great fun for all ages.
Toddlers and children of Kinder garden age will also love this app along with older kids.
